description:
Nagisa is shown around the Strawberry Dorms by Tamao and is surprised by Shizuma`s advances again and again. She also finds herself unable to move whenever Shizuma gazes at her. Nagisa discovers that the Student Council feels that Shizuma is shirking her responsibilities and resolves to remedy the situation. After much searching she finds Shizuma and convinces her to step up.
Source: crunchyroll
